name: Cricscorer
body:
CricScorer is an App for Cricket enthusiasts who like to score their games digitally and save them.
CricScorer replaces your pen-and-paper scoresheet with for fast and easy scoring. CricScorer offers an easy to use minimum touch scoring interface. You can maintain your current and previous Scorecards, Player profiles, Team profiles and Ground information. You can share your gameâ€™s live score or final scorecard pdf on Facebook, Twitter or via text, email. 

For support, feedback and suggestions please contact support@cricaze.com

Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
